Forbes Magazine is well known for its ranking lists of the worlds richest people and celebrities PERIOD

IUP was selected by Forbes Magazine as one of Americas Top Colleges . the university is one of  colleges and universities within the state of Pennsylvania to receive this recognition PERIOD IUP is also one of just six public universities within the state to be selected PERIOD

Forbes Magazine has been releasing its annual college ranking list since  but the publication used a slightly new methodology this year PERIOD

According to httpswww.forbes.comtopcolleges Forbes began using a new methodology that counts lowincome student outcomes and adds a giant federal database to Forbes tally of graduate earnings for the first time ever in . the list focuses on several different categories PERIOD

According to httpswww.forbes.comsiteschristiankreznar20210908howwerankamericastopcollegessh19be6a0743e0  percent of the ranking was based on alumni salary while  percent was based on student debt levels PERIOD The next two categories that Forbes considers are return on investment and graduation rate with both accounting for  percent of the ranking PERIOD The publication also looks at carious Forbes American leaders lists to look for alumni from various school PERIOD This portion also counts for  percent of the ranking consideration PERIOD Finally Forbes looks at retention rate and academic success levels attributing  percent of the ranking consideration to each of those categories PERIOD

After considering these categories IUP was selected for the list PERIOD The university was also selected for the publications best research universities best public colleges and best in the northeast listings PERIOD

The selection continues a stretch of success for the university with selections on various ranking lists including those by the Princeton Review U.S PERIOD News World and Report and the Wall Street JournalTimes Higher Education PERIOD

These various recognitions are meaningful to many IUP students staff members and alumni PERIOD

I think it definitely builds pride for students staff and alumni  it recognizes what IUP is doing and that IUP is competitive with colleges and universities throughout the nation  and in many cases ranked more highly than other institutions Michelle Fryling IUPs executive director of Media Relations said PERIOD

IUP prides itself on being a lowcost quality education option for students PERIOD

We have a responsibility to our students  and to our alumni to our donors and to the state and others who support us  to provide a highquality education at an affordable cost PERIOD Thats our pledge to students families and to employers Fryling said PERIOD

Fryling said that this aspect of the university is one that is central to its mission and goals PERIOD

We continue to work to become more studentcentered in everything that we do so that when students are here they get the biggest return on their investment of an education as possible  great faculty great facilities faculty who really mentor and help them an alumni network that is almost  strong and a great Career and Professional Development Office that helps students to be prepared to get those jobs that they want Fryling said PERIOD

The university is especially proud of its appearance of the best research universities lists PERIOD

Being able to do research  be it scientific research or research in the humanities field  is an extremely important skill PERIOD Thinking carefully being able to research information distill that information and compile the results of your research is applicable to almost every discipline and type of work she said PERIOD

Fryling added that this research can also benefit public safety PERIOD

Research is incredibly important to helping people lead better lives  from driver education that could save lives to safety in the workplace  its all part of being a careful thinker and communicator Fryling said PERIOD

The university relies on feedback from students and faculty in making various directional decisions PERIOD

We keep focused on our strategic plan and we keep talking with students parents alumni and employers to make sure were moving in the right direction Fryling said PERIOD

Fryling hopes that recognition like this will lead prospective students to consider IUP for their college education PERIOD

Read and study the rankings our website but definitely come here and see if its the right fit for you she said PERIOD

We think we will be. the full Forbes  college ranking list can be found by visiting httpswww.forbes.comtopcolleges PERIOD
